description: Plan smarter grocery runs with prioritized lists that learn from your edits. Find the best deals and compare prices across multiple stores to maximize savings. Track and edit lists with insights that keep your family on budget.

capabilities.name: add_item

capabilities.name: remove_item

capabilities.name: get_list

capabilities.name: search_deals
capabilities.description: Find best deals across multiple stores for specified items

capabilities.name: compare_prices

capabilities.name: list_insights
